document.full_text: nasa said on monday it is delaying the launch of space shuttle endeavour to april 29 from april 19 because of a scheduling conflict at the international space station.
document.title: nasa delays launch date for space shuttle endeavour
lines_and_colors: nasa said on monday it is delaying the launch of space shuttle endeavour to april 29 from april 19 because of a scheduling conflict at the international space station.
